com.unisoft.core.workflow.Workflow

  • Packages that use Workflow 
    Package Description
    com.unisoft.core.workflow
    package for base workflows
    com.unisoft.core.workflow.engine
    package for defining workflow engines
    com.unisoft.core.workflow.event
    package for workflow events

    • Uses of Workflow in com.unisoft.core.workflow

      Classes in com.unisoft.core.workflow that implement Workflow 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractWorkflow
      base workflow unit.
      class  ConditionalFlow  
      class  ParallelFlow
      a parallel workflow that executes its units in a parallel fashion while ignoring its order of insertion.
      class  RepeatFlow
      a looped workflow that executes a single work unit until a predicate is proven.
      class  SequentialFlow
      a sequential workflow that executes its units sequentially while respecting its order of insertion.
